alert.note: Alert for Custer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:42PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Washita, southeastern Roger Mills, southwestern Custer and northeastern Beckham Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 642 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arapaho to near Foss to 3 miles southeast of Cheyenne. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Burns Flat, Arapaho, Dill City, Canute, Bessie, Foss, Foss Reservoir, Stafford and Berlin. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 28 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
